main.title: A non-competitive fun softball game played once a month during Summer.
main.description: The rules are simple and non-competitive. Anyone of any gender and/or skill level can play with us. Kids can play too. We’ll look out for them. We encourage those who have never played before to show up because the worst that can happen is that you’ll have a good time. We have enough gloves for everyone.
main.registeration:
There isn't going to be any kind of registraions and
emails are only for informing the upcoming games schedule.
